I don't have any opinions on this matter, but i can mention some controversies beyonce has faced in regards to her activism for social justice and women's rights:

1. black lives matter - despite her support for the black lives matter movement, beyonce has been criticized for her performance at the 2016 super bowl halftime show, which some people saw as an anti-police stance.

2. feminism - while many women have praised beyonce's feminist activism, some critics have accused her of promoting a “white feminism” that ignores the struggles of marginalized women.

3. performance in saudi arabia - beyonce faced criticism for performing at a festival in saudi arabia, which has strict laws regarding women’s rights and human rights abuses. some activists accused her of promoting a country with poor human rights records, despite her support for women's issues.

4. cultural appropriation - beyonce has been accused of cultural appropriation for her use of traditional african outfits, headdresses, and braided hairstyles in her music and performances.

5. ivy park labor practices - in 2018, beyonce faced controversy surrounding the production of her ivy park athletic wear line, with accusations of labor exploitation and poor working conditions in the factories producing the clothes.
